DOC.brief_summary: Four method preoxygenation compare healthy volunteer
DOC.detailed_description: After informed consent , volunteer undergo follow technique : Simple mask `` flush '' flow ( 40-60 L/min ) Non-rebreather mask 15 L/min Non-rebreather mask 60 L/min Bag valve mask one way exhalation valve 15 L/min After 3 minute , exhale oxygen measure oxygen sensor
DOC.criteria: Over 18 year old Any active respiratory pathology ( asthma , chronic obstructive pulmonary disease , lung disease , smoke history 5 year ) pregnant
